### SimplifiedAssociatedValue {#aabe3cb56f76e6a223406ba8fd571f5f4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt;Value &#42;&gt; llvm::ValueSimplifyStateType::SimplifiedAssociatedValue</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
An assumed simplified value.

Initially, it is set to std::nullopt, which means that the value is not clear under current assumption. If in the pessimistic state, getAssumedSimplifiedValue doesn&#39;t return this value but returns orignal associated value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l04507">4507</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
